name: Nebular Crush (itch)
description:
Nebular Crush is a cyber psychedelic arcade shoot'em up where you shred your way through bizarre dimensions.

Game play combines the frantic action of classic 2D shoot'em ups with the more cerebral puzzle elements of platformers.

Inspired by 80s and 90s arcade games, Nebular Crush is designed to be easy to pick up and hard to master.

Features
  • Hardcore retro arcade action
  • Awesome soundtrack
  • Explorable world map allows for non-linear gameplay
  • Level randomization extends replayability
  • Special powers like 'slow-motion' and 'shield'
  • Loads of enemies
  • Plan for at least 50 levels
  • Local two player co-op

The game is currently in heavy development. The downloads on this page will be updated as soon as new content is ready.
